fields.title: Classic Orange Juice
fields.description: A refreshing and classic orange juice made from fresh oranges.
fields.instructions:
1. Cut the oranges in half.
2. Squeeze the juice using a juicer.
3. Strain the juice to remove pulp if desired.
4. Add honey if you prefer a sweeter taste.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Green Detox Juice
fields.description: A nutrient-packed green detox juice with kale, spinach, and cucumber.
fields.ingredients: 1 cucumber, 2 cups kale, 1 cup spinach, 1 lemon, 1 apple, 1 inch ginger
fields.instructions:
1. Wash all ingredients thoroughly.
2. Chop the cucumber, apple, and ginger into smaller pieces.
3. Add all ingredients to a juicer.
4. Juice until smooth.
5. Serve immediately.

fields.title: Berry Blast Smoothie
fields.description: A delicious and antioxidant-rich berry smoothie.
fields.ingredients: 1 cup strawberries, 1 cup blueberries, 1 cup raspberries, 1 banana, 1 cup almond milk
fields.instructions:
1. Wash all berries thoroughly.
2. Peel the banana.
3. Add all ingredients to a blender.
4. Blend until smooth.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Tropical Mango Juice
fields.description: An exotic and sweet mango juice.
fields.ingredients: 2 ripe mangoes, 1 cup coconut water, 1 tbsp lime juice
fields.instructions:
1. Peel and chop the mangoes.
2. Add mangoes and coconut water to a blender.
3. Blend until smooth.
4. Stir in lime juice.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Refreshing Lemonade
fields.instructions:
1. Squeeze the lemons to extract the juice.
2. In a pitcher, combine lemon juice, sugar, and water.
3. Stir until the sugar is dissolved.
4. Serve over ice.
